divs: sighting detailsi often take pictures of the sun and get these star like objects once in a while.. yesterday i got a cluster and on another shot one very clear and bright object. i took 30 shots around 1pm on a clear day no birds in the area (i have taken pics of birds by the sun i know what they look like, they appear as black smudges\dots). shots were taken every 5 seconds for up to 30 shots. only two shots showed objects. most of the time i do this all shots are clear, once in while i find an object. these seem to be illuminating their own light. these are not lens flare. lens flare appears as a line across the pic, these are not in that line. and it would not be a cluster. i continue also to record nightly with night vision scope. still waiting to hear about the midnight flashes i sent in a while ago. (flashes recorded for over an hour, stationary at midnight) last i heard they were still working on it.
Summary: Pictures of the Sun shows objects near it
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around December 10th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
